original_title: UFC Fight Night 54: MacDonald vs. Saffiedine
overview: UFC Fight Night 54: MacDonald vs. Saffiedine was a mixed martial arts event held at the Scotiabank Centre in Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada on October 4, 2014. The main event featured a welterweight bout between Rory MacDonald and Tarec Saffiedine.
title: UFC Fight Night 54: MacDonald vs. Saffiedine
